title: pelimies

content: $MINO, THE TAUR, reimagines memecoins with positivity, harmony, and a bullish spirit. Join us for the TAUR RUN revolution .About Mino the taurAs mythology tells us the MINOTAUR lives in caves and waits every year to receive his tribute (sacrifice).$MINO is tired of seeing how desperate communities continue to bleed and get hurt because they lack the right vibes. Do you know who lives in the caves? The Bear! Exactly! $MINO is here to send the bears back to their hibernation caves and usher in a new era…the era of TAUR RUN.“Mino the Taur is here to make memecoins great again. Bringing positive vibes like in the prehistoric year of 2021 (old school lover)…. where all the memes lived well and in harmony and with its success to start the TAUR RUN for all the crypto.”Contract Address: 0x3d6eF89924a69B577eCaF8b432e99166908d5B0aTOKENOMICSTotal Supply The total supply of tokens is 21,000,000.Liquidity Pool Currently, 15,000,000 tokens are held in the liquidity poolSacrifices A total of 6,000,000 tokens have been voluntarily sacrificed.Tax: 2% Buy/SellROADMAPPhase 1: Mino's DashQ1 2023: Mino Starts RunningQ2 2023: Turbocharged ConceptualizationQ3 2023: Token Sprint DevelopmentPhase 2: Legendary SprintQ4 2023: Epic Token Sale RaceQ1 2024: Victory Lap on ExchangesPhase 3: Mino's TriumphQ2 2024: Roaring Community CheersQ3 2024: Token Power-Up and AdoptionPhase 4: Global Mino TakeoverQ4 2024: Mino's World TourQ1 2025 onwards: Mino's Ongoing AdventureSOCIALS;Website : https://minothetaur.com/Twitter : https://twitter.com/TheTaurunishereTelegram : https://t.me/MinoTheTaurDextools : https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x5fabc318cc70fc0268e33735582895a5603db20d

comments.body: This is the most bullish bait token I have seen since bitcoin and that's saying something

comments.author: coperpulin
comments.body: $MINO, THE TAUR, is a refreshing take on memecoins, emphasizing harmony, and a bullish outlook. Tired of seeing communities suffer, $MINO aims to shift the narrative and bring about a new era of prosperity, leaving bearish sentiments behind. The reference to the Minotaur and its adds an intriguing mythological touch to this transformative vision.
